about_the_game:
Embark on a journey of survival and discovery in the twisted world of "WRONGED US". Inspired by classic survival horrors and modern storytelling, you'll face intense combat, challenging puzzles and a hostile environment with limited resources. Can you uncover the truth and survive horrors that await you?

Story:

WRONGED US

"This is the corpse of a town, rotten, bloated...

and still breathing".

Years after the tragic loss of his only son, Isaac returns to his hometown: Lowell.

But it's been changing. Slowly, like a cancer unseen until it's terminal. The seeds of bitterness and despair that were always there have since taken root. The place has transformed into something different. Something dark. Something wrong.

Haunting rumours of his son's presence have drawn Isaac back, but he soon realises that Lowell is not the same place he left behind.

Features


  • Explore the Darkness - Immerse yourself in a fleshed-out open-world descent into misery and horror. Every corner of Lowell holds secrets, mysteries, and things so disturbing, you may regret finding them.

  • Face Your Fears - As you confront the unknown and untangle the tragic lives of the town's residents, you'll find yourself staring face to face with your own personal demons.

  • Watch Your Back - Almost everyone is hiding some dark secret. It's hard to know if the people you meet want to help you or harm you. Even the ones Isaac used to know aren't quite the same. Be careful who you trust here.

  • Be Resourceful - Scavenge for weapons and resources as you take on a dangerous and diverse cast of enemies. With limited resources and deadly encounters around every corner, you'll have to rely on your cunning and strategy to survive.

  • Minimal HUD - A minimal HUD, no handholding, and no quest markers will mean that you have to rely on your own instincts and observations to navigate the world.
